tool_input.command:
cd packages/agent-cli-sdk && python3 -c "
import shutil
import os

# Directories to delete
dirs_to_delete = [
    'src/client',
    'src/core', 
    'src/factories',
    'src/adapters',
    'src/types',
    'src/utils',
    'examples/sessions',
    'examples/advanced',
    'tests/unit/client',
    'tests/integration',
    'tests/unit/adapters',
    'tests/unit/utils',
    'tests/unit/core'
]

for dir_path in dirs_to_delete:
    if os.path.exists(dir_path):
        shutil.rmtree(dir_path)
        print(f'Deleted: {dir_path}')
    else:
        print(f'Not found: {dir_path}')

# Delete examples/README.md if exists
if os.path.exists('examples/README.md'):
    os.remove('examples/README.md')
    print('Deleted: examples/README.md')
"
